jd: From: pankaj, Stellent IT pankaj@stellentit.com Reply to: pankaj@stellentit.com Cockroach DBA Location: Onsite every other week (5x per week, 2 weeks per month) in one of the following locations:Dallas, TXBoston, MASmithfield, RIMerrimack, NHJersey City, NJChicago, ILCovington, KY / Cincinnati, OHSalt Lake City, UTPhone and Video Long Term Job Description: - 5+ years of experience as a DBA- 2+ years of experience with CockroachDB (experience building out, troubleshooting, performance tuning, production support, high availability monitoring, etc.)- Experience in installation, configuration, monitoring & troubleshooting large scale distributed databases- Debugging skills & ability to troubleshoot methodically, identifying & applying fixes for known errors, capacity to think outside of the box to resolve complex issues- Scripting/automation tooling (bash/python/Ansible/Terraform) experience- Experienced in CI/CD, DevOps using tools like Udeploy, JIRA, Confluence, Jenkins, Git, ECS, Docker- Experience with Datadog, Grafana, Prometheus & integration with ServiceNow- Cloud experience with AWS, Azure, or GCP- Knowledge in REST APIs, ability to read documentation & make calls to read or write data using API- MongoDB / NoSQL database skills preferred As a Database Administrator/Engineer, you will bring your technology expertise, design and administration skills to create unique state-of-the-art database systems. We are looking for an individual who has a passion for technology tempered by a level-headed approach to problem solving and broad experience in diverse technologies. You will bring a hunger for problem solving and desire to understand and play with newer technologies and business ideas. Day to day, you will be responsible for the design, configuration and monitoring of a very large-scale database system including Relational databases, NoSQL and in memory databases. You will also be working in tandem with database administrators and data engineers across the organization.
